metadata.title: Is It Possible to Reduce Power by Intermittent Operation?

sections.content:
Question:
Is it possible to conserve power by using touch key detection intermittently?
Answer:
Power can be reduced by intermittent operation.
Refer to APN below for more information.
RA2L1 Group Capacitive Touch Low Power Guide
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/ra2l1-group-capacitive-touch-low-power-guide
RL78/G23 Group RL78/G23 Capacitive Touch Low Power Guide (SMS function)
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/rl78g23-group-rl78g23-capacitive-touch-low-power-guide-sms-function-rev100
RA6M2 Group Capacitive Touch Low Power Guide
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/ra6m2-group-capacitive-touch-low-power-guide
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
